description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a filter screen in a mobile application, allowing users to set filters for hair color, religion, ethnicity, height, and weight. It includes UI components such as checkboxes, range sliders, buttons, and headers, and interacts with state management via Provider.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the filter screen, including app bar, body, and apply/reset actions.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: Stateful widget that manages filter controls like checkboxes and range sliders.

classes.name: _FilterBodyState
classes.description: State class handling the internal state of filter range values and UI interactions.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: Widget for displaying section headers with icon and title.

classes.name: _RangeRow
classes.description: Widget displaying a label for the range slider values.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Static method to reset filters to defaults and show confirmation message.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets local filter state to default values and shows confirmation message.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Helper to build a group of checkboxes for enum options.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names to human-readable labels.
